articles.title: HRT101.S1 - Introduction to Health Research
articles.description: This course will give students a foundation in research principles and practice, mainly applied to public health. In addition, we will have weekly lectures covering various topics, including research methodology, data collection methods, statistics, R programming, data visualization(human perception, color theory, principles of visual design), etc.
